Impact of Politicians#Each civilization loses 2 culture for each empty slot on its blue bank. Orange loses 12 culture Purple loses 22 culture Green loses 8 culture Grey loses 0 culture #
Impact of Agriculture#Each civilization scores culture equal to the amount of food its farms produce. Orange scores 5 culture Purple scores 4 culture Green scores 6 culture Grey scores 3 culture #
Impact of Colonies#Each civilization scores 4 culture per colony. Orange scores 4 culture Purple scores 8 culture Green scores 16 culture Grey scores 0 culture #
Impact of Industry#Each civilization scores culture equal to the amount of resources it produce. Orange scores 12 culture Purple scores 9 culture Green scores 4 culture Grey scores 4 culture #

Impact of Technology#Each civilization scores 4 culture for each of its level III technologies (level II in Advanced game). Orange scores 24 culture Purple scores 12 culture Green scores 12 culture Grey scores 12 culture #
